body.p: A first‑time adopter may elect to use a previous GAAP revaluation of an item of property, plant and equipment at, or before, the date of transition to IFRSs as deemed cost at the date of the revaluation, if the revaluation was, at the date of the revaluation, broadly comparable to:

li.p: cost or depreciated cost in accordance with IFRSs, adjusted to reflect, for example, changes in a general or specific price index.
